Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support because it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that there was careless food waste at the Walmart in Celina, Ohio.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the food waste shown in the video is indicative of careless behavior by Walmart, without considering alternative explanations or circumstances.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the food was being responsibly disposed of due to spoilage caused by a power outage following a tornado.
Understate: The claim understates the impact of the tornado and power outage on the store and fails to acknowledge the need for proper disposal of spoiled or spoiling food.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the food was disposed of following proper procedures and in accordance with internal and health department policies.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the food waste by not providing context or acknowledging the circumstances surrounding the disposal of the food.
